content.rendered:
Directed by Shreyas Talpade.

Written by Bunty Rathore.

Cast Sunny Deol(Jagaavar Chaudhry). Bobby Deol(Vinay Sharma). Shreyas Talpade(Arjun Singh). Randheer Rai(Anuj Chaudhry). Ganesh Acharya(Self). Bharti Achrekar(Amma).Kamal Adib. Somesh Agarwal(Arjun’s Boss). Elli Avrram(Dancer in song Kudiya shehar diya). Tasha Bhambra(Kishan (Arjun’s Friend)). Samiksha Bhatnagar(Surajmukhi). Rajesh Bhosle(Dhobi who calls Vinay). Parineeti Chopra(Self). Monika Chowdhury(Receptionist In Hospital). Ajay Devgn(Self – Narrator). Triptii Dimri(Riya (as Tripti Dimri)). Meghna Erande(Suraj’s Assistant). Farhana Fatema(Rekha Madam). Ravi Jhankal(Dharamchand (Pappu)). Jitendra Joshi(Suraj Photographer). Ashwini Kalsekar(Doctor). Kamaladeep(Judge). Tusshar Kapoor(Self). Kunal Kemmu(Self (as Kunal Khemu)). Faiz Khan(Bus Conductor). Rajiv Khare(Principal). Rajesh S. Khatri(Arjun’s Father). Sachin Khedekar(Chief Minister Jagdev Alahawat). Sonali Kulkarni(Sunita). Lalu Makhija(Passenger in bus). Jiten Mukhi(Balwant Chokan). Ajit Singh Palawat(Murari (Arjun’s Friend)). Samrat Raichand(Anuj Chaudhary). Bunty Rathore(Subash Offsetwala). Jayant Rawal(Sunil’s Father). Bhupendra Shahi(Angry relative). Murli Sharma(Health Minsiter). Raj Sharma(Opposition Leader). Urmila Sharma(Jagavaar’s Sister’s Mother in law). Rohit Shetty(Self). Sunita Shirole(Daadi). Brij Shukla(Moinga). Lovely Singh(Anjali (Jagaavar’s sister)). Rohini Somkumar(Sanjana). Balvinder Singh Suri(Janakibhai Sonapatwala). Raashul Tandon(Aniket). Jayesh Thakkar(Ravi). Girish Thapar(Vakil). Arshad Warsi(Self)

Language Hindi.

Producers Trishna Chandra. Nikhil D’Rozario. Salim M. Deraiya. Hemant Kumar Dixit. Himanshu Joshi. Pranjal Khandhdiya. Kapil Madnani. Suniel S. Saini. Praful Salunke. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production Affluence Movie. Prime Focu. Sony Pictures Network.
